item.title: WATCH: 'Mission possible' for sweets-loving twins
item.description: The 3-year-old twins worked together to get a packet of candy without getting caught by their mom.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Dec. 7)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: 2 killed as Russian overnight attack hits infrastructure in Ukraine, officials say
item.description: The prime target of the attacks was the industrial city of Kremenchuk, Ukraine, where some energy infrastructure was attacked, officials said.

item.title: Sheriff hunting for the last of 3 inmates who escaped from a Louisiana jail
Man wounded in 2nd stabbing attack on North Carolina commuter train since August
item.description: Police in North Carolina have charged a 33-year-old man with stabbing someone on a commuter train in Charlotte.

item.title: Magnitude-7.0 earthquake hits in remote wilderness along Alaska-Canada border
